text.jpText:
ワタシは俺が『美しい』と
信じたことのみを遂行して生きる――
それが俺の『美学』であり『存在意義』……！
text.enText: I exist solely to pursue that which I deem "beautiful". For that is both my "aesthetic" and "raison d'être"……!

text.jpText:
故にワタシの『美しさ』の演出のためならば、
俺は阿僧祇那由多の柵を破壊し続ける――！
text.enText:
Ergo, to show the world the beauty of this 
aesthetic, I will rain endless destruction upon 
the fences that confine us, no matter how 
uncountable and inexhaustible their number!

text.jpText:
そしてワタシが破壊した柵は俺が片づけるし、
修繕も俺が完璧にやる――――
text.enText:
And I will bring order to the chaos of 
splintered remains by my own hand. 
Their restoration executed in 
unparalleled perfection ——

text.jpText:
フフ、俺のトンカチ捌きは絶技だぞ？
――見たいか？
text.enText: Heheh, the finesse with which I wield the hammer is beyond compare, you know? —— Are you eager to witness it?
